message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled capabilities, this product could potentially be a game-changer for your business. We believe its true value lies well beyond $1200000, but considering the current market conditions and your unique needs, we are willing to extend an exclusive offer at $1500000. This investment will not only provide immediate benefits but also set a foundation for long-term growth and success. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity work for both of us.

I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this price would be more in line with my financial constraints, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to this product if we can meet in the middle. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
